com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.text

Class BitmapFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.text.BitmapFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Font

    public class BitmapFont
extends java.lang.Object
implements Font
    BitmapFont.
    This class is able to load a the font format generated by BMFont.
    BMFont can be downloaded from: http://www.angelcode.com/products/bmfont/.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Detail

      • BitmapFont

        public BitmapFont()
        Creates a new BitmapFont.
        The font's data is not loaded after creation. It can be loaded with loadFromFile(String, Context).

        public int getStretchH()
        Returns the stretch percentage applied to this font's height. If this method returns 100, it means there is no stretch.

      • getAntialiasing

        public int getAntialiasing()
        Returns this font's antialiasing (supersampling value). If this method returns 1, there is no supersampling.
        Returns:
        Supersampling level

        Returns:
        scale of the height of this font's texture atlases

      • isPacked

        public boolean isPacked()
        Returns true if monochromatic colors has been defined using all color channels. In that case, getAlphaChannel() describes what is stored in each channel.
        Returns:
        true if monochromatic colors has been defined using all color channels. In that case, getAlphaChannel() describes what is stored in each channel, false otherwise

      • getAlphaChannel

        public int getAlphaChannel()
        Returns the value of the alpha channel.
        Supported values: CHANNEL_HOLDS_GLYPH, CHANNEL_HOLDS_OUTLINE, CHANNEL_HOLDS_GLYPH_AND_OUTLINE, CHANNEL_VALUE_SET_TO_ZERO, CHANNEL_VALUE_SET_TO_ONE.
        Returns:
        the value of the alpha channel

      • getRedChannel

        public int getRedChannel()
        Returns the value of the red channel.
        Supported values: CHANNEL_HOLDS_GLYPH, CHANNEL_HOLDS_OUTLINE, CHANNEL_HOLDS_GLYPH_AND_OUTLINE, CHANNEL_VALUE_SET_TO_ZERO, CHANNEL_VALUE_SET_TO_ONE.
        Returns:
        the value of the red channel

      • getGreenChannel

        public int getGreenChannel()
        Returns the value of the green channel.
        Supported values: CHANNEL_HOLDS_GLYPH, CHANNEL_HOLDS_OUTLINE, CHANNEL_HOLDS_GLYPH_AND_OUTLINE, CHANNEL_VALUE_SET_TO_ZERO, CHANNEL_VALUE_SET_TO_ONE.
        Returns:
        the value of the green channel

        Returns:
